subject: Makes 'expires_at' not appear if not set on task

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 1:

I noticed tempest failed, I think you hit bug(s):

- https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/1210483

We don't automatically recheck or reverify, so please consider
doing that manually if someone hasn't already. For a code review
which is not yet approved, you can recheck by leaving a code
review comment with just the text:

    recheck bug 1210483

For a code review which has been approved but failed to merge,
you can reverify by leaving a comment like this:

    reverify bug 1210483

Patch Set 1:

Hemanth pointed it out to me that https://github.com/openstack/glance/blob/master/glance/tests/unit/v2/test_tasks_resource.py#L567 can possibly be the unit test for checking this. So, we should try to add it there.

Patch Set 1:

Seems to me that the serializer tests are missing some validation. Not checking expires_at being one such.

Patch Set 1:

recheck bug 1210483

Patch Set 1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

(1 inline comment)

Looks good, assuming jenkins is just hitting a bug.

Patch Set 1:

I'm a bit confused, because the commit message is focusing on POST, but it seems like this is a general problem and a general fix. So I think I'm +2 on the implementation, -1 on the commit message. We should focus it to something like

  Don't show 'expires_at' if its not set
  
  <then mostly the same stuff> except change
  'Before the executor runs' to 'Before the task has finished'
Patch Set 1: I would prefer that you didn't merge this
